nodes.text: The Galacians were humanoids from the planet Gala. Their skin was a distinctive pale bluish tone, which they called "moonlight." They were therefore frequently called "moon people."

The Galacians consisted of three separate tribes: the city people, the hill people, and the sea people. They were ruled by the Beju-Tallah dynasty until 44 BBY when Queen Veda stepped down in favor of a democratically elected leader.
